snippet: The Irish Arts Council announced it was creating a Laureate for Irish Fiction, who will receive 150,000 euros over three years to focus on writing and to help promote Irish literature.
abstract: The Irish Arts Council announced it was creating a Laureate for Irish Fiction, who will receive 150,000 euros over three years to focus on writing and to help promote Irish literature.

headline.main: An Irish Laureate, for Fiction's Sake
headline.print_headline: An Irish Laureate, For Fiction’s Sake
